The Bride Story: Your Complete Bridal

A wedding is the most precious and most awaited day in the life of almost every girl, who dreams about looking her best and having everything perfect on her special day. We, at BookMyMakeup, have come with an absolutely wonderful and consolidated bridal service package for the lovely brides-to-be. We understand the importance of the D-day in a girl’s life and also relate to how difficult and stressful it becomes to select the ideal everything. And that’s why to retain that million-dollar smile on our brides, we thought of putting the best of all bridal services at one platform together.

Be it booking the right salon or make-up artist for your day or building your trousseau including the most coveted treasure of every bride, the ‘Lehenga’, we have got your back. From the best make-up products for your post marriage looks or the right collection of lingerie to make you feel confident and beautiful or even finding the right wedding photography talent, we cater to all your needs at just a few clicks on your e-device.

Let’s have a quick look at the plethora of services we offer our lovely girls in the form of a complete wedding package.

1. Make-Up Artist or Salon Services- The utmost important aspect of looking your very best on your day is to crack that utopic bridal make-up look that matches your personality and suits your style. Literally one wrong stroke of a brush and your day can be nearly ruined and of course, nobody would want to take that chance. So to put your delicate mind at ease, we have put together a selectively chosen list of the very best make-up artists and salon for getting your favourite look for the wedding. You can view their profiles and their work, take trials or experience their live sessions to get an idea about their unique taste of beauty to find your match. We swear by the work of every salon/ artist that’s on the list.

2. Bridal Wear- Equally important as getting the right make-up look is getting that perfect outfit for all your wedding events including engagement ceremony, reception or sangeet, especially the wedding. We have tied-up as an exclusive partner with the leading bridal wear brand, Frontier for getting you the choicest of bridal pieces for your events to make you simply stand out in a breath-taking fashion. The brand is renowned for its uniqueness, classy designs and premium quality to give you nothing but the best.

3. Lingerie Collection- No wedding trousseau for the bride is complete without getting a few stylish and sensual lingerie sets to your collection. It may seem a tab bit cliché but it’s definitely on the mind of every bride-to-be. To feel good and confident in your skin is most important while being at your comfortable best and so splurging a little on your once-in-a-lifetime occasion is mandatory. You can take your pick from our exquisite array of lingerie sets from some of the top brand names in the segment to give you just the right edge needed for that beautiful look for your man.

4. Wedding Photography- Right up-close with the make-up and bridal attire comes the wedding photography standards as memories are forever and you don’t want to miss out on capturing as well as showcasing your wondrous moments with your loved ones. And as photographs are forever, you better make the most of it for these days are coming back for a redo. Wedding photography has become extremely popular with no dearth of talented photographers to make your day truly special. We have had our team carefully review the work of our selected photography talents and put them here for a reason. You can view their collections and decide for yourself how you want to capture and store your future memories. Rest assured about the quality work offered on the table, we got you only the best.

5. Make-up Products Wedding Edition- Now, the festivities are not the only time for a bride to feel special and look her best, it’s only the beginning. Next comes the most amazing part, the honeymoon, followed by those extended family dinners and what not. So, you better be prepared with your own make-up collection to aid you in creating simple, classy yet outstanding looks for all these small yet precious moments. We have put together for you a wide range of luxury make-up products to choose from top global brands like Sephora, Estee Lauder, M.A.C. and many more to help you make a totally envious bridal make-up package. Afterall, initial impressions go a long way and you do want to be your finest version of yourself in front of relatives and friends and particularly, for those fantastic honeymoon pictures.

Now that we have got you started, you must be feeling spoilt for choice or even a bit overwhelmed with so many choices to make and so many services to finalize. But worry not for we have our experts for you at the click of a button to guide you and watch out this space for a more detailed guide on bridal everything.
